snippet: Many who were leading the world's major economies pictured in a 2009 photo are no longer in office, primarily the political victims of the recession and voter anger directed at incumbents.
abstract: Many who were leading the world's major economies pictured in a 2009 photo are no longer in office, primarily the political victims of the recession and voter anger directed at incumbents.

headline.main: For Global Leaders, Including Obama, a Game of Survivor
headline.print_headline: Power Meeting: Daunting Picture for Obama, Based on a 2009 Photo
